about_the_game:
Experience graphic, realistic S&M play, and live out your dirtiest desires in a space where no one can see or hurt you. This girl is yours and yours alone, so feel free to love, hold, and tease her to your heart's content...

Instructions:
Touching the red cube allows you to switch between situations.
Touching the blue cube allows you to change your girl's clothes, or make her nude.
6DoF is fully supported. Feel free to move around the room as you see fit.

Features:
The player can pick up items, and use them to hit or tease their girl.
Footage from the video camera is displayed on the monitor, and the camera can be moved freely.
Vivid moans, cries, and sound effects add new layers of enjoyment.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains content or themes that are appropriate only for adult.

Themes in this game include:
> Explicit consensual sex scenes
> Nakedness
> genitals
> lewd situations
> Bondage scenes, and mild violence
> BDSM-related content

All persons involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.

name: BDSM VR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce® GTX 970 or AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR
